title: This Hidden Ethereum (ETH) Support Is Extremely Important
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: Ethereum, the second-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization, has been experiencing a challenging phase. The once-thriving DeFi and NFT sectors, which significantly contributed to Ethereum's meteoric rise, are currently subdued. The buzz and activity around these sectors have dwindled, leading to a noticeable decline in Ethereum's trading volume.

title: BTC Primed for Major Run, Biggest DOGE Fan Elon Musk Scores New Record, Shibarium Boosts Shiba Inu's Network Growth: Crypto News Digest by U.Today
author: Valeria Blokhina
excerpt: Here are the top four news stories of the last weekend presented to you by U.Today.

title: XRP Price Crash Reveals Intriguing Fact: Details
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: XRP plummeted along with the rest of the crypto market on Oct. 9 as bearish pressure emerged. XRP, the fifth cryptocurrency by market capitalization, fell to intraday lows of $0.487 from highs of $0.52, reaching a three-week low, or lows last seen on Sept. 18.

title: Cardano (ADA) Project Catalyst Achieved Number of Milestones in Fund10 Round
author: Vladislav Sopov
excerpt: Cardano (ADA), the second-largest proof-of-stake (PoS) blockchain by market captalization, has just finished its decentralized funding initiative, Project Catalyst. Its tenth iteration set an impressive number of record-breaking highs in key metrics.

title: Shiba Inu (SHIB) Triggers 1,500% On-chain Spike, What's Going On?
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Canine-themed Shiba Inu is showing a surprising on-chain spike as the market experiences selling pressure.

title: Base TVL Jumps 26% in Week, What's Behind This Move?
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: Layer-2 blockchain protocol Base has hit a new milestone as it pushes on to enforce its dominance among the L2 chains on the Ethereum blockchain. According to data from L2Beat, the Base network's total value locked (TVL) is now pegged at $550 million, up by more than 26% in the week-to-date (WTD) period.

title: Binance (BNB) Launches Copy Trading Module
author: Vladislav Sopov
excerpt: Binance (BNB), the world's largest cryptocurrency trading platform, invites all of their customers to try their skills in an automated copy trading module. Its leaderboard features master traders with impressive PnL and assets under management (AUM) metrics.

title: Ethereum's Vitalik Buterin Attracts More Criticism from Cardano's Hoskinson
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Ethereum's co-founder Vitalik Buterin recently discussed potential protocol and staking pool changes for the Ethereum network, suggesting they could enhance decentralization and efficiency. However, his comments have drawn criticism from Charles Hoskinson, the founder of Cardano, and other members of the Cardano community.

title: Tornado Cash Reigns Supreme on Ethereum
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Despite facing sanctions from the U.S. Treasury in August 2022, Tornado Cash continues to dominate as the premier crypto mixer on the Ethereum network.

title: Top Ripple Executive Calls It Quits
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Kristina Campbell, the chief financial officer of cryptocurrency giant Ripple, has departed her role. She will now be assuming the mantle of CFO at Maven Clinic.

title: Multiple Bitcoin Price ATHs? Binance CEO Weighs In on Bitcoin Halving
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Binance, one of the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges, has added a bitcoin halving countdown to its homepage. In his post, CEO Changpeng Zhao has hinted that the price of Bitcoin could see multiple all-time highs if the flagship cryptocurrency were to repeat previous price cycles.

title: Shiba Inu Eyes Explosive 353% Surge in Large Transactions Worth 2.6 Trillion SHIB
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a stunning turn of events, Shiba Inu (SHIB) ecosystem has been shaken to its core by an unprecedented surge in substantial on-chain transactions. According to a report by IntoTheBlock, the standout highlight of this phenomenon is a jaw-dropping 353% surge in large transactions valued at $100,000 or more. This meteoric rise unfolded within the span of a day since the weekend started.

title: Bancor (BNT) up 48%, Here's Possible Reason
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: There is an ongoing onslaught in the digital currency ecosystem today, as marked by the more than 0.30% drop in combined market capitalization, which is now pegged at $1.09 trillion. Amid this rout, decentralized finance (DeFi) protocol Bancor (BNT) is shining brightly, with its price up by more than 48% to $0.6201.

title: XRP Dives Under Crucial Support Level: Price Drop Incoming?
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: XRP has recently taken a dive below a significant support level, raising concerns among investors and traders about its immediate future. As of the latest data, XRP is trading at $0.5133, a value that is indicative of the bearish sentiment surrounding the asset.

title: XRP Ledger Unveils Crucial Feature: Details
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: XRP Ledger (XRPL) has introduced a new feature that is aimed at improving the transparency of the protocol while serving its developer base much better. According to an X update from XRPScan, XRPL now has Ledger Object Support. This new innovation is being pushed to make XRPL more usable for both the developers building on it as well as users looking to make an inspection.

title: XRP and Solana (SOL) Options Officially Arriving at Major Crypto Exchange in January
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a strategic move amid a sluggish crypto market, Deribit, the world's leading cryptocurrency options exchange, has revealed its groundbreaking plan to launch options trading for XRP and Solana (SOL) come January, reports Bloomberg.

title: Cardano Founder Slams New Book on FTX Crash as “Apology Tour” for SBF
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: Founder of Cardano, mathematician and billionaire Charles Hoskinson, has taken to the X social media platform to share his take on the recently released book on the scandalous collapse of the FTX crypto giant in November last year.

title: Binance CZ Makes Bold Bitcoin Prediction Regarding Coming BTC Halving
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: Changpeng Zhao, chief executive and cofounder of Binance exchange, has published a post on the new Binance Feed platform (part of Binance, not a separate website) and then shared a link to it on the X app.

title: Ripple Selling? Millions of XRP on Move to New Destination
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Crypto data tracker Whale Alert reports that millions of XRP shifted in recent hours. In total, 89 million XRP were transferred to new destinations.

title: Elon Musk Supports Dogecoin Creator's Thesis
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: In a recent exchange on the social media platform X, previously known as Twitter, we saw two influential figures weigh in on a contentious topic. The debate was sparked by a statement from the SEC in the Coinbase case, asserting that "crypto has 'no innate or inherent value.'"

title: XRP Community Celebrates as Binance Introduces New Trading Pair
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a recent update, Binance, a leading cryptocurrency exchange, announced the addition of WBETH as a new collateral asset on both the Cross Margin and Isolated Margin platforms. This update also introduced several new trading pairs on Cross Margin and Isolated Margin, expanding the options available to traders.

title: Ethereum Foundation Just Sold Millions in ETH Before Price Made Another Drop
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: According to various on-chain data sources, earlier today, Ethereum Foundation transferred a substantial amount of Ethereum (ETH) to Uniswap DEX. A total of 1,700 ETH was sold for 2.738 million USDC.

title: SHIB, XRP, ADA Most Hit in Crypto Market Flash Crash
author: Godfrey Benjamin
excerpt: The digital currency ecosystem is fast receding in what appears to be an unexpected flash crash engulfing the market. The combined digital currency is down by 1.52% to $1.07, fueling the paring of gains even from coins that started the new week off on a mildly bullish note. With the current switch in momentum, Shiba Inu (SHIB), XRP and Cardano (ADA) appear to be the biggest hit altcoins today.

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Dips Below $28,000: Here's What to Know
author: Tomiwabold Olajide
excerpt: Bitcoin recovered above the much-coveted $28,000 level on Oct. 6, reaching highs of $28,288. In the days following, Bitcoin oscillated back and forth near the $28,000 critical level but was unable to surpass the $28,110 mark.

title: Fantom Becoming Ghost Chain? Dramatic Multichain Hack Killed Whole Network
author: Arman Shirinyan
excerpt: The decentralized finance (DeFi) landscape has been riddled with vulnerabilities, and the recent Multichain hack has added another dark chapter to its history. Fantom, a high-performance, scalable and secure smart contract platform, has been hit hard after its colossal $1.5 billion exploit, raising questions about its future viability.

title: Cardano-Linked AI Platform Partners With Oldest Metaverse Decentraland
author: Vladislav Sopov
excerpt: SophiaVerse (SOPH), an immersive project centered around humanoid robot Sophia, expands to Decentraland (MANA), the longest-running metaverse and play-to-earn ecosystem. SophiaVerse (SOPH) users can get rewarded wth unique assets from Decentraland (MANA).

title: Interest in Bitcoin (BTC) Plunges to Lowest Level Since 2020
author: Alex Dovbnya
excerpt: Search interest in Bitcoin, the pioneer digital currency, has dipped to its lowest level since October 2020, according to Google Trends data. The flagship cryptocurrency is currently sitting at the $27,500 level.

title: Ripple v. SEC: Legal Veteran Unveils Key Exit Route for XRP Case
author: Gamza Khanzadaev
excerpt: In a surprising turn of events, former SEC director in San Francisco Marc Fagel has emerged as a prominent voice in the ongoing Ripple v. SEC legal saga. Fagel, a seasoned law enforcement specialist, has put forth compelling strategies that could potentially define the course of the XRP case.

title: Shytoshi Kusama Names One Vital Reason For Future SHIB Price Rise
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: After a recent tweet thread dedicated to global events and unrelated to SHIB or crypto, the lead developer of the popular Shiba Inu meme coin received a comment where the author pointed out the fact that the SHIB price "hasn't moved an inch."

title: Elon Musk Infects XRP Army With Enthusiasm With His X Post
author: Yuri Molchan
excerpt: In a post published earlier today on the X social media platform, the owner of this platform and Tesla CEO Elon Musk shared a new short video that features the X app logo. It prompted a heated reaction from the crypto community and especially from the XRP army. They again noted the striking similarity of the X symbol of the app to the XRP logo.
